phrases: And it is been really dry lately, right?
So Yumiko brought this little humidifier to school,
and it was spitting out a ton of steam all through class!
You know, those new ones powered by... USJ?
USA?
That kind!
That slight smile has not changed since that day.
Our days have not changed.
I would love to have one of those in my room.
Right, Hikki?
Days spent just trying not to run away...
Earth to Hikki!
I am listening.
And it is USB.
Why should humidifiers have to get their power from America?
Yeah, that is it!
USB!
Cell phones these days can be charged with that USB thing, too.
Anyway, what should we do for Christmas?
I will be busy getting ready for the new year.
To keep from making the things we have lost into excuses,
Yeah, but...
we steel ourselves more than usual,
trying harder than usual to act the same as usual.
Christmas, huh?
I know about Ebina, but...
What about you guys?
I will have to pass, too.
H-Hayato...
You have plans or something?
Huh...
Hikki...
You are looking at us too much.
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
Huh?
Er, I was not really looking...
No, you were totally looking.
I was kind of freaked out, honestly.
You are the one who should stop looking at me.
Huh?!
Oh, that was...
I just sensed something, that is all.
Some kind of pressure, or chill...
Those two do not feel anything alike.
Is that what you meant?
Anyway, did you need something?
No, it is just...
you guys were drawing attention to yourselves.
Just then, somewhere inside, something hit me.
Why was I watching them?
Morning!
Morning, Sai-chan!
Morning.
Something wrong?
I just thought it was unusual to see you two talking in the classroom.
Y-You think so?
Did something happen?
No, nothing!
Well, we were kind of talking about club stuff, I guess...
Oh, your club, huh?
Well, if you guys are back to doing club work like before, that is good.
Y-Yeah...
Oh, hey, you can come to us if you ever need help again.
Nah, you know what?
You can come, even if you do not need anything.
You are motivated for once!
Well, later.
By the way, Hikki...
Let us go to club together.
See ya!
Yep.
Why did you leave first?
I did not.
I am waiting here.
Yeah, but...
Wait, so you do not mind?
Let us go.
By the way, what do you do at lunch?
Huh?
Oh...
Same as always.
I see.
Hey...
Never mind.
I see.
Yahello, Yukinon!
And he said it is unusual for me and Hikki to talk in the classroom.
How long will this continue?
Did he?
I suppose it might be unusual.
How long will we be able to keep this up?
Not really.
Right, Hikki?
What will happen when we cannot keep it up anymore?
No, that was probably the first time we talked that much.
It kind of tired me out.
It tired you out?!
I was probably watching Hayama and his buddies
because I felt like they would teach me
how to mend something that is fallen apart.
Come in.
Senpai!
I am in trouble!
I am in trouble!
I am in trouble!
I am in serious trouble!
A Christmas event?
Yeah.
So that is your first student council job...
It is a joint thing with Kaihin General High School,
and I guess we are supposed to entertain old folks and preschool kids.
Who came up with that idea?
It was the other school!
As if I would ever suggest something like that!
I figured.
So of course, I would normally turn them down, you know?
I have plans for Christmas, anyway.
You would turn them down?
You are handling your freedom too personally.
But Hiratsuka-sensei is telling us to do it.
I should have known she had a hand in this...
So I got started with things, but it is just not coming together.
That is how it goes when you deal with other schools.
Do not feel bad.
Actually, you should have talked to Shiromeguri-senpai before coming here.
Oh... w-well... I mean, uh...
Oh, yeah!
I cannot bother her when she is studying for entrance exams, right?
Um, you just do not like Meguri-senpai, right?
You are the only ones I can turn to!
Okay... I have an idea of what is going on, but...
What do you think?
Sounds good!
Let us do it!
It is been a while since anyone's asked for our help, you know?
We have not done anything like this lately.
So, just like before...
I mean... it could not hurt to try...
I think...
Really?
I think it is fine, then.
No, I do not think we should mess with this.
It is the student council's problem.
Plus, I do not think it is a good thing to rely on other people right
after you take over as president.
Huh?!
What does that mean?
We are not a jack-of-all-trades service.
We only help people out.
Anyway, this is your job.
Got it?
Go on.
I took over as president because you said I should!
I want you to do something about this!
Being told that weakens me.
It only makes sense that I should take responsibility for Isshiki Iroha.
Which means there is one other person
I need to take responsibility for.
Would you object to me helping you
on a personal level, not for the club?
Huh?
Well, yeah, I am fine with that...
If it is just you alone, I can use
I can rest easy.
I mean, I can rely on you.
You do not have to correct yourself.
What about Hayama, anyway?
Are not times like these when you should get him to help you?
This is a tough job, so I did not want to bother him with it...
But you do not mind bothering me?
I mean, not that I care...
Still, who knew she would say something noble like she did not want to bother him?
I guess even Isshiki can act like a girl in love.
I have got to admire that.
Besides, with stuff like this,
it is cute how he cannot handle simple things.
It is his mistakes that I like about him.
Asking him to do something that is actually hard would just scare him off.
Oh... I see.
Some winning personality she is got.
Give it back!
Return to me my admiration!
Okay, let us meet at the school gate afterward.
What?
We are starting today?
We do not have much time.
Okay, then change the meeting location.
It would be embarrassing if my friends saw us leaving together and started rumors.
Huh?
Hm, is she in the wrong generation to get the humor of that?
She is not even responding with But you do not have any friends.
Total poker face.
Okay, then...
You know where the community center is?
We will meet there.
Fine.
I will head there after I get ready.
Okay, see you there, then!
You really are sneaky...
What did Iroha-chan say?
She whined a lot, but she seemed to understand.
I see...
And that was the first time in a while that I hoped we could do something...
Something else will come up soon enough.
Maybe it is actually better if we do not get any requests.
If we just do not do anything.
Maybe.
Then what have I...
What have we...
been doing all this time?
Sorry I made you wait.
I had a little shopping to do.
It is fine...
What is that irritating face for?
You were not trying to call attention to how heavy your bags are so I would carry them?
Uh, no, that was just a natural reaction.
You were not trying to hit on me, were you?
I am sorry.
My heart fluttered for a moment, but after calming down, I still cannot.
Huh?
I see...
How many times do I have to get rejected by this girl?
Th-Thank you...
No big deal.
It is part of my job.
Wow, you are so dependable!
In that case, take care of the next part, too, okay?
Lecture Room 1
Hi, everyone.
Chiba City Mihama Ward Takasu Community Center
I am Tamanawa, student council president of Kaihin General High School.
Nice to meet you.
Yeah... hello.
I am really glad
we had the chance to plan this together, as two fresh, rookie presidents.
I am hoping we can forge a partnership of mutual respect
and bring about a synergetic effect.
He throws a good punch right from the get-go...
Iroha-chan, got a minute?
Sure!
Huh?
Hikigaya?
Hey...
You are on the student council?
No.
Same as me, then!
I am here because my friend asked me to come...
Huh?
Wait, you are alone?
All the time, pretty much.
What the heck?
That is hilarious!
No it is not...
Well, see ya!
Senpai, there is someone here you know?
The way you said that sounded like
Someone exists that you know?
Do not do that.
Besides, you have seen her before.
Who is the girl, anyway?
Yeah, she was my classmate in middle school.
Yeah?
Oh, the meeting's starting.
This way, Senpai.
Uh, I would rather stay on the sidelines...
About the Christmas Event Plan
Okay, so just like last time,
let us start by brainstorming.
First on the agenda is the event concept
and sharing of ideas for activities.
Considering the demands that fall on us as high school students,
I believe we need to come up with some
innovation befitting of young minds.
In that case, naturally, we need to ponder on the premise of
a win-win relationship with the community.
Then we will probably have to think strategically in terms of cost-effectiveness.
What is going on right now?
Huh?
No idea.
The other school is making suggestions for us, I guess.
Huh...
Everyone, is not there something more important to consider?
We should use logical thinking to think logically.
Are not those the same thing?
How many times are we supposed to think?
We should put ourselves in the customer's place to see from the customers' perspective.
Again, are not those the same thing?
How many times do we have to become the customer?
Then we could give some thought to outsourcing.
With our current method, that might be tough to fit in the scheme.
What do you think?
There is a chance it could be rescheduled, too.
Should not we give ourselves more of a buffer?
Oh, that is true.
We should look at the whole picture.
Are you getting an idea of how it all works?
No, I did not understand a thing.
Yeah, they were saying some difficult stuff, huh?
But when I say stuff like Wow, I need to work hard, too,
that goes over really well.
Otherwise, all I really have to do is email back and forth with them.
You are going to get stabbed someday.
But you are like that sometimes, too, Senpai.
Like you are trying to look smart or interesting...
Do not put me on their level.
I do not care about looking interesting.
I am just self-conscious.
Huh...
I do not get it.
Anyway, I have worked out what we need to do, so let us start tackling it.
What?
You seem to be getting on well enough with them.
Yeah, I guess so.
But you are the one who taught me
that younger girls trying to learn something are cute, right?
I did not teach you that.
But now you do not need me, do you?
Ah... Well...
Iroha-chan, can you take care of these, too?
Also this, and this, and this, too.
Ah, okay.
If there is anything you do not understand, let me know.
I will explain it so you can understand.
So as you heard, getting the minutes together will be our job, too.
I am counting on all of you.
Does not look like we can say the student council is functioning well.
I am sure there is some reservation between them,
but it looks like that is hindering their communication.
President, is this okay?
Oh... I will check.
Also, about the way this work is progressing...
Yes?
Actually, never mind.
He is the vice president.
Looks like you have got it rough.
I do not think he likes me much...
But that is how it always goes at first.
He will get used to me eventually.
Mihama Library
Takasu Community Festival
Senpai!
Your reactions are too weak.
Because you are just being sneaky with that.
Oh, come on.
I am just being natural.
But you know, I think that is pretty sneaky of you, too.
Oh, come on.
I am just being natural.
Hey, wait up!
Lecture Room 1
Our outline of the plan has not completely solidified yet,
so let us continue our brainstorming from yesterday.
As long as we are doing this, I would like to make it more flashy.
Yeah!
That is the thing!
We should do something big, something with a real bang!
Yes, we may have been pulling everything together too closely.
Huh?
Really?
Something was pulled together?
The minutes do not have anything in them but logical thinking blah blah blah.
I do not know what I am supposed to do.
Well, that is because nothing specific has been settled on yet.
I think we should increase the scale.
What do you think?
Ah...
You might be right.
We do not have the time or the personnel to increase the scale.
No, no, not like that.
When brainstorming, you do not reject another's opinion.
We cannot make this any bigger because we lack the time and personnel.
So how should we deal with that?
We expand the discussion in that way.
We must not come to a conclusion right away.
So your opinion does not work.
O-Okay...
For all you said, you wasted no time rejecting my opinion...
Let us discuss how to make it possible.
Why do not we bring in more local high schools?
Whoa, whoa.
Why do people who want to look interesting
love working with others so much?
There is no merit in bringing in more schools.
Sounds good.
We would be involving the community.
But a simple objection like that would be crushed.
In that case, we could work toward closing generation gaps.
That will work!
I will have to say this in a way that fits their rules.
This is just a fresh idea.
As a counter to your previous suggestion,
I feel it would be better to strive for the maximum synergetic effect
by having our two schools cooperate to build a closer relationship.
What do you think?
I see...
So it should not be a high school.
Perhaps college students...
It did not work!
No, wait.
Then we cannot take initiative.
Even if we are to reach a consensus with our stakeholders,
we need a partnership in which we can offer clear suggestions of a solid manifesto...
Senpai, what are you talking about?
I am the one saying it, and I do not know myself.
That is true.
He understood that?!
Then how about a local elementary school?
What do you call it?
Gameducation?
If we can make the work enjoyable,
maybe we could get a local elementary school to help.
That would be win-win.
Win-win!
Yeah!
That is the thing!
What is the thing?
If we handle the appointment and negotiation of an elementary school...
If you could handle them after that, I would appreciate it.
Good idea.
What do you think?
Okay, got it.
Yo!
Were you on the student council or anything in middle school?
You seem used to it.
I am not.
Did you break up with your girlfriend?
What?
I mean, it just seemed like you had your sights on Isshiki-chan.
I could not have broken up.
I have never had a girlfriend.
Really?
I thought you were going out with one of those two girls.
Which two girls?
You know, the ones who showed up on that date.
They are just... in the same club as me.
You are in a club?
Which one?
The Service Club.
What is that?
I do not get it!
That is hilarious!
No, it is not.
Seriously, what does that club do?
That is my first seriously of the day!
Yeah, it is a club that does not make much sense.
I have never heard of a Service Club before!
But it is not funny.
Without Incident, The Congress Dances, But Does Not Progress.
There is really nothing to laugh about.
07 Yet, That Room Continues to Play Out the Endless Days.
We should consider the priority of each task
and come up with an order of priority.
That will work!
Those mean the same thing.
How many times do you want to prioritize?
What is being demanded of us now
is the flexibility of flexible ideas that only young minds can invent!
That is the thing!
Those mean the same thing.
How flexible are we supposed to get?
All right.
Now our scheme to drop all of our resources into this event is ready.
I look forward to our next brainstorm!
Getting ready is all we have done...
